articles.content:
The atmosphere cleans itself by creating a molecule called hydroxide (OH) through a previously unknown mechanism, according to a new, peer-reviewed study.
Hydroxide oxidises many gases released by n… [+3371 chars]

articles.author: Scott Pelley
articles.title: NASA's Webb telescope captures new views of the universe | 60 Minutes - CBS News
articles.description: As NASA's Webb telescope scours the universe to find light from the first stars and galaxies, it is also capturing the universe like never before. Scott Pelley got an inside look at Webb's new discoveries.
articles.content: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope has hardly opened its eyes and the universe is new-- more mysterious, more beautiful than humanity's dreams. The largest telescope ever flown launched into deep spac… [+10763 chars]
